hehe :P nevermind guys. You have to HOLD DOWN the left mouse button to mine/destroy. I actually ended up buying the game.

Anybody having trouble actually playing the game as in uLoop, xx12yanxx, ohgodwhat's comments: You DO have to hold the left mouse button down until the block is destroyed. Some blocks can only be properly mined with the different tools you can build. Go to "minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Main_Page" For a comprehensive wiki explaining anything and everything in the game. Have fun!

uloop have you tried to hold down the mouse button?

Don't download this file.

Inside this file it extract a file known as "hotfix.exe" for those unfamiliar with this file its a rogue anti-virus program (trojan)

I fell victim of it too, on Windows 7 it will open up to a splash screen and tell you all this information; you may have to start your computer up in safemode and open up task manager and close the file "hotfix.exe". Luckily for me I was able to find the file under Appdata > Roaming and delete it for good.

I've heard accounts if your unable to do that, you can go to settings on the splashscreen of this monster and click launch unprotected; hit the "X" and you can boot to your desktop. If you got AVG it will detect this file in a few minutes of uptime.

So once again; don't download this trojan!

-Dhiz

Forgot to mention the AV Program is called "Thinkpoint" google it and see for yourself.

-Dhiz

new changelog is

1.1_02 	December 22 2010 	

    * Fixed the chest not opening with empty hands bug. 

1.1_01 	December 22 2010 	

    * Added a missing font file in the package build. 

1.1 	December 22 2010 	

    * Fixed â€œfancyâ€ characters not working in the game by detaching font resources from the code.
    * Rewrote leaf decay.
    * Fixed FPS drops in single player.
    * Fixed players getting spammed with data and getting disconnected in SMP.
    * Fixed the item dupe bug in SMP. 

    * A few special events happened on the following specific days (according to system time):
          o On the date of Christmas Eve to Boxing Day:
                + The quote on the main menu said, "Merry X-mas!"
                + All players wore a Christmas themed cape. 
          o On the date of New Years Eve:
                + All player wore a purple cape with an 11 on it to celebrate the coming year. 
          o On the date of New Years Day:
                + The quote on the main menu said, "Happy New Year!" 

1.0.2 	December 21 2010 	

    * Fixed problem where game wouldn't run on Macs plus possibly other unknown fixes.

i'm trying to use hamachi to play with my friend. can someone please explain to me step by step?

Yes
___
1. download this http://www.minecraft.net/download/minecraft_server.jar?v=1301564946798
put it in a Empty folder
2. Start it
/...wait
3. close it =)

4. you should see a file named Server.properties
5. open it
6. IP should be 0.0.0.0
7. port 25565
8. and change "Verify Names/name" To false
9 then start it
10 login with hamachi or "127.0.0.1" /Localhost
IF that dsnt work then try "GooglE" it
